import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Patch an organization secret"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"patch"}
  path={"/v1/organization/secrets/{secret_name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to patch an organization secret.<br/><br/>To learn more about secrets management, check out the [documentation](https://docs.getport.io/sso-rbac/port-secrets).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"secret_name","required":true,"description":"The name of the secret you want to patch.<br/>"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"secretValue":{"type":"string","description":"The new value of the secret.<br/>"},"description":{"type":"string","maxLength":200,"description":"The new description of the secret.<br/>"}},"additionalProperties":false,"required":[]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Default Response"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
